name: Blob (itch) (MaliGarnet)
description:
Made by:

Ronja Wittke

Achim Kretz

Melanie Maaß

Blob is a 2D puzzle platformer with a single level.

Play as a young magician who was turned into a slime after an accident. Gather magical elements to help him regain his human form!

The english tutorial sheet is included in the zip folder.
